intro.text:
Greetings, space traveler.

I see you have bought your first spaceship, the Vagabond. An admirable ship, but a bit lacking. Perhaps you will find yourself flying a DMW luxury space cruiser one day. Nevermind that, you seem a pretty skilled trader, I bet you'll own a moon someday.

By the way, I'm sorry to hear about your parents. They truly were great people.

Yours truly,
Morris
